actions.in_committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation

official_title: A bill to amend the Water Resources Development Act of 1974 to modify the non-Federal share of the cost of constructing bridges over the Norfolk Reservoir, Arkansas.

summary.text: Amends the Water Resources Development Act of 1974 to increase the non-Federal share (to be paid by the State of Arkansas) of the cost of constructing a bridge over the Norfolk Reservoir, Arkansas.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Water Resources Development Act of 1974 to modify the non-Federal share of the cost of constructing bridges over the Norfolk Reservoir, Arkansas.
